desc: The one little secret your wedding planner might not tell you: The Bridal Bra™ Body. The perfect match for underneath your wedding gown and 12 other "specialists" for underneath your backless wedding dress. Bodies, adhesive bras, balconette bras, the corset, even single bra cups your party dress. Backless & strapless!

layout.text: The perfect match for underneath your wedding dress
